q: Two months after Barack Obama signed a law that will lead to the repeal of Don't Ask, Don't Tell, Donald Rumsfeld told ABC News Radio that the nation is ready for open service. First of all, we know that gays and lesbians have been serving in the military for decades with honorable service, Donald Rumsfeld said.
